summary: Implements form field and widget classes that allow Django forms to accept, validate, and render PostgreSQL range types (numeric, date, datetime with timezone). The field aggregates lower and upper bound inputs into a single range object, while the widget presents separate inputs for each bound and extracts them back into the field.
business_intent: Provide developers with ready‑to‑use components for handling PostgreSQL range columns in web forms, simplifying user input, data cleaning, and display of range values within Django applications.
